PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-09442009-06-11,  ,  ,  ,  CFIA, 
ActCanada Agricultural Products Act
SubjectOrganic Products Regulations, 2009
PrecisTo facilitate international market access, to provide protection to consumers against deceptive and misleading labelling practices through a uniform approach to organic product certification and labelling, to support further development of the domestic market and to allow the preservation of the organic nature and integrity of organic products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0176 Publication Date: 2009-06-24
